name: Mystery Trackers 12: Queen Of Hearts Collector's Edition
name_original: Mystery Trackers 12: Queen Of Hearts Collector's Edition
description:
Mystery Trackers 12: Queen Of Hearts Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Elephant Games. It came out on 11-12-2016. Big Fish Games published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Mystery Trackers 12: Queen Of Hearts Collector's Edition on PC.
